title: Sample Project
description: A demonstration project showcasing the minimalist template system for Guccione Browser portfolio pages

hero.subtitle: Exploring minimalist design patterns for creative technology portfolios

overview.longDescription:
This is a sample project demonstrating the flexible JSON-driven template system for Guccione Browser portfolio pages. The system draws inspiration from minimalist portfolio designs while providing maximum flexibility for customization.

Each project can have its own unique theme, color palette, typography, and layout configuration. The grid-based positioning system allows for sophisticated layouts while maintaining simplicity and ease of content management.

customSections.title: Design Process
customSections.content:
The design process began with research into minimalist portfolio websites, analyzing patterns from sites like jnackash.com, shuangli.info, and shuangcai.cargo.site.

Key principles included generous whitespace, typography-driven hierarchy, and content-focused layouts with minimal decoration.
